item.title: Hammer Editor Rail Hand bug
item.dc:creator: LordDz
item.description:
The_Guardian:

Apparently I found a bug in hammer editor, in view model, after I saw the model rail hand, now it appears at all models in model view.

It happens with all models from time to time, it’s just the way Hammer likes to keep things interesting.
There’s no need to restart the editor, just open and close the model editor and it usually goes away. If not, select a different prop_static and open the model in it.

Hi Guardian does it still happen if you close Hammer and restart steam ? [/size]

if you go into hammer options general and untick use VGUI model browser restart hammer then open a map and place a model using the folder view to pick the model save the vmf then close hammer reopen it and then options and tick the use VGUI model browser , the view in the model browser should be fixed
